definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning/Hoping township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning/Hoping township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: to settle (a dispute out of court)/to reconcile/settlement/conciliation/to become reconciled
to ease (tension)/to alleviate/to moderate/to allay/to make more mild

sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 這些中藥中就有生長於雲南和貴州的茯苓。

sentences.english: NH3-N and concentration of particles reached lnd standard of sewage treatment plant.
sentences.chinese: 濃度和濁度達到國家一級排放標準。

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的轉變也是如此，和顛覆身體的生死一樣。

sentences.english: Other violence occurred at Friendship Road and at Liberation Road, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他們說還有其它的暴力事件發生在友誼路和解放大道。

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部絞痛，嘔吐和腹瀉，通常是血便。

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒並決定減少壓力和調整飲食，改變現狀。

sentences.english: Sucess depends on your endeavor and capability.
sentences.chinese: 成功與否取決於你的努力和能力。

sentences.english: He pillaged the country of its treasures and of its best people.
sentences.chinese: 他掠奪了這個國家的財富和百姓中的精英。

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麥當勞和肯得及就是利用這種國際化策略來盈利的。

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在後階段，她們還配備了連發槍以及軍棍和軍刀。

sentences.english: This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國人對於入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一樣，馬白夫公公也認爲植物是有靈魂的。

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 這個風景英俊山區和上莊儲藏着很多溫泉。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
